author: RTÉ News
title: A shining example of solidarity across Ireland
description: People of all ages, from all parts of Ireland have been invited to take part in the #ShineYourLight campaign at 9pm tonight in a gesture of hope and solidarity during the Covid-19 pandemic.
content:
People of all ages, from all parts of Ireland have been invited to take part in the #ShineYourLight campaign at 9pm tonight in a gesture of hope and solidarity during the Covid-19 pandemic.
The  RTÉ initiative was launched by Culture Minister Josepha Madigan… [+2038 chars]
